```{python}
import pandas as pd
from datalearning import df


descriptions = {
    'column1': 'Description of column1',
    'column2': 'Description of column2',
    'column3': 'Description of column3',
    'column4': 'Description of column4',
    'column5': 'Description of column5',
    'column6': 'Description of column6',
    'column7': 'Description of column7',
    'column8': 'Description of column8',

}

data_dict = pd.DataFrame({
    'Variable': df.columns,
    'Description': [descriptions.get(col, '') for col in df.columns],
    'Data Type': [df[col].dtype for col in df.columns]
})

from IPython.display import display, HTML

display(HTML(data_dict.to_html()))
``` 
